document.full_text: after his fifth suspension in 12 n.h.l. seasons, for elbowing rangers defenseman ryan mcdonagh, matt cooke promised he would change his style of play.
document.title: n.h.l. roundup: penguins forward regrets dangerous play
lines_and_colors: after his fifth suspension in 12 n.h.l. seasons, for elbowing rangers defenseman ryan mcdonagh, matt cooke promised he would change his style of play.
